name: @cloudflare/sandbox
description: A sandboxed environment for running commands

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsup src/*.ts --outDir dist --dts --sourcemap --format esm
scripts.docker:publish: wrangler containers push registry.cloudflare.com/8acffcc765d5baa91c873d1459ba1a19/sandbox:latest && wrangler containers push registry.cloudflare.com/8acffcc765d5baa91c873d1459ba1a19/sandbox:$npm_package_version
